metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use Rundll32 - PowerShell
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Rundll32 in Scripts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM script_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('&&')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('rundll32')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('shell32.dll')) AND contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('shellexec_rundll')) AND (contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('value')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('invoke')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('comspec')) OR contains(lower(script.script_content.value), lower('iex'))))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use Rundll32 in Scripts
